TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed JournalEntryPosition extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the position in navigation history of a piece of content with respect to current content. JournalEntryPosition is used by <see cref="T:System.Windows.Navigation.JournalEntryUnifiedViewConverter">.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Navigation.JournalEntryPosition Back = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Content is in back navigation history relative to current content.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Navigation.JournalEntryPosition Current = int32(1)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Navigation.JournalEntryPosition Forward = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Content is in forward navigation history with respect to current content.
